name: Hypership Out of Control
description: Space is a dangerous placed for even the most seasoned starship pilot, full of asteroids, multicolored floating blocks, and space mines. It's even more dangerous when you your accelerator is stuck to the floor and your brakes are out.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel/AMD Memory: 128 MB RAM Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel/AMD Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 300 MB available space

reviews.review_text: There are really only two things you need to know about Hyper Ship Out Of Control. Firstly, it’s brilliant for the 80 points that it will cost you, and secondly, you will not be able to complete it. Ever.  Overall rating 6/10.         YouTube™ Video:  Hypership Out of Control Gameplay PC HD [1080p 60FPS]
